content.howToPlay: Start with choosing the game mode. You have single-player and two-player options. Select between iconic classic cars from the garage.You can select the same car as your friend. You can distinguish your cars by their colors. 1st player takes the orange while the second gets the blue car.Pick a level and hit the start button.Use arrow keys and WASD to control your cars. Make use of boosts when you need to make stunts and jumps on this crazy road. To boost the speed, press left shift (1st player) or M key (2nd player).You can hit a tree, sign or fall down the road. And it doesn't have to be the end of the race for you. Just respawn by pressing the R or L key and continue where you left off.
content.developer: 2 Player Crazy Racer is developed by FreezeNova.

fullContent: Home› Racing2 Player Crazy RacerBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full Screen Drive on the Streets of Long Island in the 60's  Fancy of retro cars and surroundings? Want to take a ride with a classic car? Try 2 Player Crazy Racer, a fantastic 3D racing game that you can play with your friend using a single keyboard. Be the winner of the race, gather the coins and unlock your dream vintage car. 2 Player Crazy Racer lets you step into the vibrant world of the 60s. The visuals are not appealing just to beginners but also to seasoned gamers! This game's great selection of cars might evoke your memories of iconic video games like L.A. Noire and Mafia: Definitive Edition. How to Play 2 Player Crazy RacerStart with choosing the game mode.
